title: 206 - Jesus Was Not a Racist (Why Context Matters)
description:
Mike & Bonnie discuss a blog article by Sarah Bessey. How damaging is it to use scripture out of context to support a claim? How much can it harm the cause you're arguing for? How can we be peacemakers instead of peace keepers? 

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
